overview: Based on a true story this intimate,tale follows Tom치s an immigrant laborer who fled his country by shipping himself in a crate years before the story starts. Tom치s now lives off the grid, performing odd jobs for an upper-middle-class family, and saving money to eventually buy a home for the family he left behind. A series of events forces Tom치s out of his solitary life to engage with people of his community in search of something lost. However, this journey reflects Tom치s own social and emotional turmoil: even though he emigrated to the US, he has psychologically never left his crate.
title: Amigo
